author: topix.com
title: Hillary Clinton tells Texas high school student Ahmed Mohamed 'keep building' - KHOU-TV Houston
text:
There are 1 comment on the KHOU-TV Houston story from 2 hrs ago, titled Hillary Clinton tells Texas high school student Ahmed Mohamed 'keep building' . In it, KHOU-TV Houston reports that:
After a Texas high school student said school officials called police in mistakenly thinking a clock he invented looked like a fake bomb, folks on Twitter have been vocal about supporting the teenager. Hillary Clinton tells Texas high school student Ahmed Mohamed 'keep building' After a Texas high school student said school officials called police in mistakenly thinking a clock he invented looked like a fake bomb, folks on Twitter have been vocal about supporting the teenager.
Join the discussion below, or Read more at KHOU-TV Houston.
